ActorTalk: This isn't how the experience was supposed to end. Did something change in the loop?
Is that... a clock? The hands... they're moving in reverse.
We might return to the beginning, or the end, or wind up on a completely new path.
But when we open our eyes again, we'll find each other, won't we?
No matter how this ends, [PlayerName], I'll be there, waiting for you.
